mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r JOIN property p ON r.property_code = p.property_code WHERE r.reservation_status = 'RESERVED' AND r.canceled_at IS NULL AND DATE(r.created_at) = CURDATE() AND p.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )

SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r JOIN property p ON r.property_code = p.property_code WHERE r.reservation_status = 'CANCELED' AND r.canceled_at IS NOT NULL AND DATE(r.canceled_at) = CURDATE() AND p.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )

SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r JOIN property p ON r.property_code = p.property_code WHERE r.reservation_status = 'NO_SHOW' AND DATE(r.updated_at) = CURDATE() AND p.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )

SELECT s.stay_code FROM stay s JOIN reservation r ON s.reservation_code = r.reservation_code JOIN property p ON r.property_code = p.property_code WHERE s.actual_checkin_at IS NOT NULL AND DATE(s.actual_checkin_at) = CURDATE() AND p.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.stay_code = s.stay_code )

SELECT s.stay_code FROM stay s JOIN reservation r ON s.reservation_code = r.reservation_code JOIN property p ON r.property_code = p.property_code WHERE s.actual_checkout_at IS NOT NULL AND DATE(s.actual_checkout_at) = CURDATE() AND p.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.stay_code = s.stay_code )
